TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WsiProfiles extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes the Web services interoperability (WSI) specification to which a Web service claims to conform.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The WS-I organization publishes non-proprietary Web services specifications to promote the interoperability of Web services across platforms. This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.ConformsTo%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute> attribute to indicate the WSI specification to which the Web service claims to conform.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles BasicProfile1_1 = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The web service claims to conform to the WSI Basic Profile version 1.1.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The web service makes no conformance claims.
